p: Leaves of Chasmanthera dependens were collected from a location in Ilorin, Kwara State, Nigeria. Leaves were identified at the Department of Pharmacognosy and Drug Development, Faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences, University of Ilorin. Authentication was done at the herbarium of the Department of Plant Biology, University of Ilorin. A voucher number UILH/001/1042 was deposited for future references. Leaves were air dried at room temperature for 5 days and further dried in an oven at 45 Â°C for seven days. The leaves were then milled into powder and kept for extraction. This same sequence was repeated for the leaves of Chenopodium ambrosioides; a voucher number UILH/002/136 was deposited.
